Description: Up for sale is a Older Pre Owned Carvin American Made Electric 6 String Guitar.Unfortunately there is no model or serial anywhere on the guitar so we cannot tell you the exact model.The electronics are in working condition but the volume pot is rather scratchy and will cut in and out a little when turned sometimes.There is light to moderate fret wear and the neck is straight. There are a couple of chips on the tips of the guitar as shown and it looks as if a moderate size scratch was painted over on the back. *** PLEASE NOTE!
